title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings connectors for Ollama; plug local models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational TUI for Ollama written in Go; supports history, markdown rendering, keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers async, streaming, and embedding APIs with POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; same generate/chat/embed API in idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image with CUDA & CPU runners; one command to serve models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that connects to Ollama via REST; includes streaming, markdown, and theme switch.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated Modelfile collection (Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Zephyr, etc.) maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial but popular C#/.NET client for Ollama with async, streaming, and cancellation tokens.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from notes for summarization or brainstorming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin for running local LLM prompts via Ollama and injecting results into blocks.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; supports slash commands and model switching.
